analysis.description:
Bartcoin (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#27-209) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#134-144)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol:
	Contract Bartcoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#198-201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Bartcoin.CYCLES should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#52)
Bartcoin.DECIMAL_PLACES should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#37-38)
Bartcoin.NEUTRAL_ADDRESS should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#43-46)
Bartcoin.OWNER_NAME should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#48-50)
Bartcoin.SYMBOL should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#34)
Bartcoin.TOKEN_NAME should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#35-36)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#1): it allows old versions
Bartcoin.OWNER_NAME (/unique_chucks/8/0xaedf6c8b3e50bf7ea578d0d30ecce488d72db074.sol#48-50) is never used in Bartcoin
